CustomField.formula: IF(amc__Monday__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(amc__Tuesday__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(amc__Wednesday__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(amc__Thursday__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(amc__Friday__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(amc__Saturday__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(amc__Sunday__c > 0, 1, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula: Identifies how many days contain a value greater than 0 to calculate the number of days per week the Role works
CustomField.label: Days per Week
